title: Introducing the Assist satellite entity
description: Users typically interact with Assist using remote voice satellites, such as the ESP32-S3-BOX-3 running ESPHome, analog phones running VoIP, and more. The integrations managing these satellites have used ad-hoc binary_sensor and select entities to allow users to configure the satellite's pipeline, automate based on the pipeline state, etc.
